participant_1.background:
I have won tap dance competitions.
I have a twin brother.
My favorite book is david copperfield.
I m really short.
I love to bake cakes.

participant_2.background:
I like to make short films.
My mother is a well known celebrity.
I have been on the tv news six times.
I have traveled overseas many times.
I am a civil war reenactment participant.

content.text: My favorite book is The Lord of the Rings. It's a fantasy novel by J.R.R. Tolkien.
I've heard good things about that book. I've never read it, but I've seen the movies.
The movies are great, but the books are even better. I've read them all multiple times.
I'm not much of a reader, but I might have to give it a try.
You should! It's a great book.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to make short films. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to do.
That's cool! I've always wanted to make a short film, but I don't know where to start.
There are a lot of great resources online. You can find tutorials on how to make a short film, and you can also find people who are willing to help you make one.
That's good to know. I might have to give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
What else do you like to do?
I like to travel. I've been to a lot of different countries.
I've never been out of the country. I'd love to travel, but I don't have the money.
You should start saving up! It's worth it.
You should! There are so many amazing places to see in the world.
